General.Name: B-52 Capital Public Company Limited
General.Description: B-52 Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, operates local business network platform in Thailand. The company operates through E-commerce Business; Trading of Consumer Products; Advertising Media Service Business; Financial Services as Lead Generator; Providing Media Advertising Services by using Computers through Various Systems; and Health Products segments. It provides wholesale distribution, retail sales, and advertising media solutions. The company also offers logistical and distribution solutions to retailers; e-commerce marketing solutions; media and marketing solutions; and network marketing solutions under the TANJAI-D name. In addition, it provides financial settlement services through electronic platform, such as WeChat and Alipay; and offers financial services. Further, the company operates businesses to help research and innovation to be used in commercial efficiency; manufacture and distributes products related to medicine, health, beauty, and other products; provides brokerage agency services, including international money transfer; and wholesales pharmaceutical and medical goods, and medical services. B-52 Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
